SEARCH

Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
AnimationInformation
Represents metadata and behavior for an animated object, including frame data and timing information.
ChannelType
Enum representing the different types of channels in the color system.
ColorChannel
Represents a color channel with a name and type.
ColorSpace
Represents predefined color spaces, each defined by a specific set of ColorChannels.
DataCompressionType
Enum representing the types of data compression available for use in image saving operations.
DefaultValue
Represents a default value provider for a color channel based on its bit width.
DynamicColorChannel
A ColorChannel implementation representing a dynamic color channel.
EditableAnimationInformation
An interface extending AnimationInformation to provide editable functionality for animation data.
EditableFrame
An interface extending Frame to provide editable functionality for individual image frames.
EditableMetadataContainer
Represents a container for editable metadata.
EditablePixel
An interface extending Pixel to provide editable functionality for individual pixels.
EditableWtfImage
Represents an editable version of a WtfImage.
FixedColorChannel
A ColorChannel implementation representing a fixed color channel.
Frame
Represents a single image frame consisting of a 2D array of Pixel values.
IllegalCharacterException
Thrown to indicate that an illegal character was encountered during processing.
MaxDefaultValue
A DefaultValue implementation that returns the maximum possible value for a given color channel width.
MetadataContainer
Represents a container for metadata.
NotYetImplementedException
Exception thrown to indicate that a requested feature or functionality has not yet been implemented.
NumberOutOfBoundsException
Thrown to indicate that a numeric value is outside of the expected bounds.
Pixel
Represents a single pixel in an image, defined by a ColorSpace and a mapping of ColorChannel values.
ValueNotSetException
Thrown to indicate that a required value was not set when creating an image.
Version
Represents the version of a WtfImage.
WtfException
Thrown to indicate that an image contains broken or corrupt data.
WtfImage
The WtfImage interface represents an image with defined properties and functions, supporting various color spaces, metadata manipulation, and animation information.
WtfImageBuilder
The WtfImageBuilder class provides a fluent API for constructing instances of WtfImage.
WtfLoader
The WtfLoader class is used to handle the creation and loading of WtfImage objects.
ZeroDefaultValue
A DefaultValue implementation that always returns zero, regardless of the channel width.
